body_html:
People who may have an informed opinion on this: @shlens, @sguada, @vincentvanhoucke.

To your questions:

  1. This function should probably go into the image module, since it's specific to image data.
  2. Yes, please add a name_scope. It'll make the graph more readable in tensorboard.
  3. It would be good to have a batch version which returns a vector. I would expect to be used more than the single image version.

It would be good to have a batch version which returns a vector. I would expect to be used more than the single image version.
body:
People who may have an informed opinion on this: @shlens, @sguada, @vincentvanhoucke.

To your questions: 

1) This function should probably go into the image module, since it's specific to image data.
2) Yes, please add a name_scope. It'll make the graph more readable in tensorboard.
3) It would be good to have a batch version which returns a vector. I would expect to be used more than the single image version.
